subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Barcelona Coach Pep Guardiola said he would leave at the end of the season, bringing to a close a four-year reign of unprecedented success with one of the greatest soccer teams of all time.
snippet: Barcelona Coach Pep Guardiola said he would leave at the end of the season, bringing to a close a four-year reign of unprecedented success with one of the greatest soccer teams of all time.
